response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe its value extends far beyond its monetary worth, making it a valuable asset for any individual or business. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, we propose a price of $900,000 for this extraordinary product. This offer is designed to ensure a fair exchange while maximizing the value we receive for our product. We are confident that this price aligns well with the perceived value of the product to you, allowing us both to benefit from this transaction. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 900000}
